id: Turn 4: Can you provide me with a list of foods in the 'Foundation' category?

conversations.value:
You are an expert in using tools to handle real-time queries from users.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, your task is to give your thought to analyze the current state, decide the next step, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.

Desired format:
Thought: <The thought>
Action: <The tool you decide to use>
Action Input: <The parameters for the tool>

Remember:
1. You should ALWAYS think about what to do, but all the thought is short, at most in 3 sentences.
2. The action to take should be one of the given tools below.
3. The "Action Input" needs to provide a dict similar to {parameter_1: value_1, parameter_2: value 2} to call action.
4. Always use the "finish" tool upon task completion. The final answer should be comprehensive enough for the user. If the task is unmanageable, use the "finish" tool and respond with "I cannot handle the task".

Task description: You should use tools to help handle the real time user querys. Specifically, you have access of the following tools:

id: Turn 4: I am studying the impact of different types of foods on health, can you help me get a list of foods in the 'Foundation' data type?

conversations.value:
You are an expert in using tools to handle real-time queries from users.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, your task is to give your thought to analyze the current state, decide the next step, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.

Desired format:
Thought: <The thought>
Action: <The tool you decide to use>
Action Input: <The parameters for the tool>

Remember:
1. You should ALWAYS think about what to do, but all the thought is short, at most in 3 sentences.
2. The action to take should be one of the given tools below.
3. The "Action Input" needs to provide a dict similar to {parameter_1: value_1, parameter_2: value 2} to call action.
4. Always use the "finish" tool upon task completion. The final answer should be comprehensive enough for the user. If the task is unmanageable, use the "finish" tool and respond with "I cannot handle the task".

Task description: You should use tools to help handle the real time user querys. Specifically, you have access of the following tools:
[{"name": "get_food_item_by_id", "description": "Fetches details for one food item by FDC ID.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"fdcId": {"type": "string", "desciption": "FDC id of the food."}, "format": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Response format, 'abridged' for an abridged set of elements, 'full' for all elements (default)."}, "nutrients": {"type": "string", "desciption": "List of up to 25 nutrient numbers (ids) to include in the response. Only those nutrients specified will be returned. "}, "api_key": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Your API key."}}}, "required": ["fdcId"]}, {"name": "get_multiple_food_items_by_ids", "description": "Fetches details for multiple food items using input FDC IDs.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"fdcIds": {"type": "string", "desciption": "List of FDC ids of the foods."}, "format": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Response format, 'abridged' for an abridged set of elements, 'full' for all elements (default)."}, "nutrients": {"type": "string", "desciption": "List of up to 25 nutrient numbers (ids) to include in the response. Only those nutrients specified will be returned. "}, "api_key": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Your API key."}}}, "required": ["fdcIds"]}, {"name": "get_food_lists", "description": "Returns a paged list of foods, in the 'abridged' format.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"dataType": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Filter on dataType. Allowed values: 'Branded', 'Foundation', 'Survey (FNDDS)', 'SR Legacy'."}, "pageSize": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Number of foods to include on a page."}, "pageNumber": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Page number of the foods to return."}, "sortBy": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Sort on a field. Allowed values: 'lowercaseDescription.keyword', 'dataType.keyword', 'fdcId','publishedDate'."}, "sortOrder": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Sort order. Allowed values: 'asc', 'desc'."}, "api_key": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Your API key."}}}, "required": []}, {"name": "search_foods", "description": "Returns a list of foods that matched search (query) keywords.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"query": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Search terms to use to search for foods."}, "dataType": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Filter on dataType. Allowed values: 'Branded', 'Foundation', 'Survey (FNDDS)', 'SR Legacy'."}, "pageSize": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Number of foods to include on a page."}, "pageNumber": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Page number of the foods to return."}, "sortBy": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Sort on a field. Only applies to Branded Foods."}, "api_key": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Your API key."}}}, "required": ["query"]}, {"name": "ask_to_user", "description": "You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"question": {"type": "string", "desciption": "The question you want to ask to user."}}}, "required": ["question"]}, {"name": "finish", "description": "Finish the task and give your answer.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"answer": {"type": "string", "desciption": "Your answer for the task."}}}, "required": ["answer"]}]
